title: Hot shots! (Captioned)
creator_credit: Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation, Peter Miller Investment Corp, Bill Badalato and Jim Abrahams
brief_description: A spoof of “Top Gun” in which Charlie Sheen stars as Topeer Harley, an ace fighter pilot who’s recruited to join a team of crack (or is it cracked?) jet jockeys for a top-secret mission Led by their incompetent commander (Lloyd Bridges). The squadron includes a half-blind pilot named ‘Wash-Out’ and a vain and smug golden boy. Together they train for operation ‘Sleepy Weasle’, a lightning strike against a desert kingdom. Meanwhile they spend their nights carousing in a nightclub where the beautiful airbase psychiatrist moonlights as a sexy chanteuse. To round out the insanity, a devious contractor is out to sabotage their mission.
